notesStmt.note: Intended to be issued as part 2 of STC 3177.5, but the printing was suppressed; see preface of STC 1247. The title pages listed under STC 1246 (see STC, 2nd ed., I, p. 57) are found at the end of STC 3178--Cf. STC.
Copy catalogued is bound and filmed with STC 3178.
